activities: We use personal information provided by customers to better understand their needs, as well as to determine how we can improve our products and services. With their permission we may also use this personal information to contact them with announcements and promotions or with questions about their account that may arise.

personaldata: All customer personal data is covered. The data covered includes manually processed data (for example, tradeshow leads entered manually).
